blog.title: Web Worker
blog.summary: Web Workers are used for running heavy scripts in a background thread without causing the site to freeze.

list: Web Workers are used for running heavy scripts in a background thread without causing the site to freeze.
You can write a new web worker using new keyword.

blog.title: Service Worker
blog.summary: Service Workers are a type of web worker.

list: Service Workers are a type of web worker.
They are useful for modifying responses from network requests.
They are used for building offline applications
You can write a service worker using register method.

blog.title: Difference between Web worker vs Service Worker
blog.summaryTitle: Difference between Web worker vs Service Worker
blog.summary: Service workers are basically web workers but with specific approach.

list: Service workers are basically web workers but with specific approach.
Service workers are specifically target for proxing api responses and for offline application.

blog.title: What is pure function
blog.summary: For Pure function, function should meet two criterias

list: For Pure function, function should meet two criterias
For given same input function should always return same output
The function should not cause any side effects outside of its scope
